column5: Hey guys, I need sum help. I'm looking for a tarp builder that is sum where from Richmond hill cross To Bolton. It would be helpful if they can do repairs as well.  Thanks Paul.
Paul.. did you call the dealer you bought the boat from?? That cover should be covered and they should send you a new one for FREE.
Wayne, Only had time to e mail him so far. Of course no reply. It may take some time since I bought state side.So I figure it's trash. I would repair it and use for early and late season towing.
If not, there are afew guys in the st creek area.I waiting for my buds father in law to make one for me as well.
Does it need to be resewed TYBO?Or is it trashed?
It can be save. The thing is so bad torn. To patch it.It should be measured on the boat.It will help to keep it true.
There's a good canvas shop in the Port Credit Marina but it is a little spendy. They can make you a cover out of any of the high end materials (Sunbrella, Sharkskin etc.) in any colour you want.
This guy is the best in my opinion Paul, besides it gives Joey and yourself an excuse to come over for BBQ and beer  Quite  a few OFC'rs have used Gunner..     G
Gerritt, Little bit further then I want to go.But the BBQ sounds good.
